alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Powell, southern Montgomery and east central Estill Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stanton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rosslyn and Cat Creek around 645 PM EDT. Bowen and Cottage Furnace around 650 PM EDT. Knowlton around 655 PM EDT. Furnace and Lombard around 700 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rogers Chapel, Nada and Slade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
